subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tony Dungy made a convincing argument that Washington, which picks second in the N.F.L. draft, is actually a better fit for Robert Griffin III than Indianapolis, which has the first overall pick.
snippet: Tony Dungy made a convincing argument that Washington, which picks second in the N.F.L. draft, is actually a better fit for Robert Griffin III than Indianapolis, which has the first overall pick.
